title: epi2me-labs/wf-human-variation pipeline parameters
description: consolidated human variation calling pipeline for ONT data

basic_input_output_options.title: Basic Input/Output Options
basic_input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

fast5_dir.description: Directory containing fast5 for basecalling [not supported]

ubam.description: unaligned BAM file of reads to be aligned to --ref

bam.description: BAM alignment file of reads to genomic reference. A corresponding .bai file must also be present.

bed.description: A BED file describing regions to process.

model.description: Clair3 Model directory. These can be obtained from http://www.bio8.cs.hku.hk/clair3/clair3_models/ and https://github.com/nanoporetech/rerio/tree/master/clair3_models.

out_dir.description: Directory for output of all user-facing files.

threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for more intense processes (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_map_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for aligning reads from uBAM (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_sort_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for sorting and indexing aligned reads from uBAM (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_bam2fq_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for uncompressing uBAM and generating FASTQ for alignment (limited by config executor cpus)

tr_bed.description: Input .bed file containing tandem repeat annotations for the reference genome. Improves accuracy in our benchmarking.

cluster_merge_pos.description: Max. merging distance for insertions and deletions on the same read and cluster in non-repeat regions

sniffles_args.description: Additional command line arguments to pass to the sniffles2 process

ref_pct_full.description: Expected percentage of low quality 0/0 variants called in the pileup mode for full-alignment mode calling.

var_pct_full.description: Expected percentage of low quality 0/1 and 1/1 variants called in the pileup mode for full-alignment mode calling.

snp_min_af.description: Minimum SNP AF required for a candidate variant.

indel_min_af.description: Minimum Indel AF required for a candidate variant.

vcf_fn.description: Candidate sites VCF file input, variants will only be called at the sites in the VCF file if provided.

use_longphase.description: Use longphase for final phasing of output variants (experimental).

min_cov.description: Minimum coverage required to call a variant (experimental).

min_mq.description: Reads with mapping quality < min_mq are filtered (experimental).

min_contig_size.description: Contigs with contig size < min_contig_size are filtered (experimental).

sample_name.description: Sample name to be displayed in workflow outputs.

ctg_name.description: The name of the sequence to be processed

include_all_ctgs.description: Call variants on all contigs, otherwise call in chr{1..22,X,Y}.

disable_ping.description: Enable to prevent sending a workflow ping.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

guppy_args.description: Additional command line arguments to pass to the guppy_basecaller process

methyl_options.title: Methylation calling options
methyl_options.description: Options related to calling methylation sites

methyl.description: Enable methylation calling [requires input BAM with Ml and Mm tags]

process_label.description: The main process label for template processes to use by default

docs.intro:
## Introduction

This workflow uses [Clair3](https://www.github.com/HKU-BAL/Clair3) for calling small
variants from long reads. Clair3 makes the best of two methods: pileup (for fast
calling of variant candidates in high confidence regions), and full-alignment
(to improve precision of calls of more complex candidates).

This workflow uses [sniffles2](https://github.com/fritzsedlazeck/Sniffles) for
calling structural variants.

This workflow uses [modbam2bed](https://github.com/epi2me-labs/modbam2bed) for
aggregate modified base counts into a [bedMethyl](https://www.encodeproject.org/data-standards/wgbs/) file.
